statements: DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND email = 'john.smith@example.com';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND amount < 50.00

DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Delivered';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
